daos.name: ImpactDAOs (General Concept)
daos.description: Defined as any DAO that generates net positive externalities for its ecosystem, considered the foundational building blocks of regenerative cryptoeconomics.

daos.name: AthenaDAO
daos.description: A decentralized community of researchers, funders, and advocates dedicated to advancing women's health research, education, and funding, supporting translational research from discovery through licensing IP assets.

daos.name: Bio.xyz
daos.description: A biotech DAO accelerator and DeSci meta-governance layer that provides funding and support to innovators in decentralized science, incubating various biotech DAOs like VitaDAO and PsyDAO.

daos.name: VitaDAO
daos.description: A community-owned collective that funds and supports longevity science, where token holders choose which research projects to support in the fight against age-related diseases.

daos.name: HairDAO
daos.description: An open-source R&D network where patients and researchers collaborate to develop new treatments for hair loss, with the community deciding which research projects receive funding.

daos.name: PsyDAO
daos.description: Aims to build a user-owned and operated psychedelic future, ensuring psychedelic intellectual property is freely traded, collectively owned, and responsibly managed for the benefit of all humankind.

daos.name: ValleyDAO
daos.description: Addresses critical climate and food challenges by funding and incubating academic research and building a community in synthetic biology and industrial biotechnology for sustainable product production.

daos.name: CryoDAO
daos.description: Aims to advance cryopreservation research with high potential to improve the field's quality and capabilities, focusing on increasing the quality of organ and human preservation.

daos.name: LabDAO
daos.description: An online life science research collective offering open tools and infrastructure for computational projects, allowing researchers to access BioML models and track results.

daos.name: Cerebrum DAO
daos.description: An open global community dedicated to advancing brain health and preventing neurodegeneration, primarily focusing on Alzheimer's and funding high-risk, high-reward "moonshot" projects.

daos.name: WaterLAB
daos.description: A project redefining water management by classifying and measuring regenerative water attributes, aiming to bring transparency, sustainability, and regenerative practices to the water industry.

daos.name: dClimate
daos.description: The first DAO for climate data, forecasts, and models, with a mission to create a reliable, blockchain-based climate record accessible through a data marketplace.

daos.name: GoodDollar
daos.description: A protocol governed by its members to promote decentralized financial education and access for all, generating and distributing crypto Universal Basic Income (UBI) via its G$ token.

daos.name: Glo Dollar
daos.description: A US-regulated and fiat-backed stablecoin company where revenue generated is donated to public goods and charity, embedding philanthropy directly into money.

daos.name: Octant
daos.description: Allows users to earn ETH rewards by funding public goods and projects they care about, aiming to be the first self-sustaining global public goods financing ecosystem.

daos.name: ETH Evacuations
daos.description: An initiative that funds evacuations from conflict zones using ETH, tipping tokens, and NFT mints, enabling families to cover coordination fees.

daos.name: GitcoinDAO
daos.description: An Ethereum-powered platform that transforms how open-source projects are created and funded, enabling developers to contribute, earn rewards, and fund beneficial projects through quadratic funding.

daos.name: Artizen
daos.description: A community-funded platform for art, science, and public goods, seeking to rebuild trust in philanthropy through a transparent and community-driven funding approach.

daos.name: HumanDAO
daos.description: A community-funded social impact DAO dedicated to onboarding people from low-income or underserved backgrounds into crypto and Web3.

daos.name: Protocol Guild
daos.description: A collective of Ethereum core protocol contributors focused on enabling distributed funding for distributed systems and enhancing incentives for stewarding Ethereum's core protocol.

daos.name: Clr.fund
daos.description: A protocol using quadratic funding to efficiently allocate funds in support of public goods that benefit the Ethereum Network.

daos.name: Endaoment
daos.description: A nonprofit community foundation and public charity built on the Ethereum blockchain, enabling anyone to donate digital assets to any qualified U.S. nonprofit organization.

daos.name: Breadchain
daos.description: A collective of decentralized cooperative projects using solidarity primitives to forge relationships and advance community interests over profit maximization and equitable capital distribution.

daos.name: Giveth
daos.description: A community-driven donation platform leveraging blockchain technology to connect real-world projects with regenerative funding opportunities, building a culture of giving that rewards.

daos.name: Public Nouns DAO
daos.description: Supports public goods by experimenting with new funding methods, spreading awareness, and directly funding public goods and charitable initiatives, known for its unique governance and tokenomics.

daos.name: Ukraine DAO
daos.description: A community of Ukrainians that was instrumental in channeling crypto donations to Ukrainian organizations supporting war victims after the Russian invasion, notably by auctioning a Ukraine flag NFT.

daos.name: Moss.earth
daos.description: A Brazilian climate tech company that tokenizes reforestation and conservation projects in the Amazon Rainforest, promoting biodiversity conservation and ecosystem restoration.

daos.name: Nori
daos.description: A marketplace connecting buyers and suppliers to carbon removal, guaranteeing CO2 sequestration and supporting regenerative agriculture practices.

daos.name: Flow Carbon
daos.description: Advances the voluntary carbon market by using blockchain to improve liquidity and transparency in carbon markets, directing more capital into conservation, reforestation, and ecosystem restoration projects.

daos.name: Koko DAO
daos.description: Builds a model to verify and compensate for small-scale conservation, aiming to develop new blockchain-based methods to reward rural communities for conserving their land.

daos.name: Kokonut Network
daos.description: A blockchain cooperative encouraging regenerative agriculture through promoting, organizing, funding, and managing coconut farms.

daos.name: Silvi
daos.description: A movement that plants trees and generates sustainable livelihoods for millions, aiming for 1 trillion trees planted by 100 million people, restoring ecosystems and empowering local communities.

daos.name: OpenCivics
daos.description: A civic innovation consortium and decentralized collaborative network dedicated to fostering civic engagement and supporting public goods for communities and commons.

daos.name: Coral Tribe
daos.description: A community of impact investors using Web3 climate finance to support sustainable businesses through the ReFi Hub platform, with members voting on fund allocations for environmental goals.

daos.name: LetsGrow DAO
daos.description: Drives the Regen and ReFi movements by fostering regenerative practices and unifying diverse efforts within the ecosystem, supporting projects with positive environmental impacts.

daos.name: Goldfinch
daos.description: Unlocks lending to anyone in the world through a decentralized credit protocol for crypto loans without collateral, expanding access to capital in emerging markets.

daos.name: PopcornDAO
daos.description: Creates yield-generating DeFi products for users to earn from their cryptoassets and redistribute a portion of those earnings to impact causes.

daos.name: $REGEN
daos.description: A new culture (meme)coin for Optimists that aims to combine degen vibes with regen(erative) energy to create a positive sum impact in the world, rewarding regenerative-focused activities.

daos.name: Regen Network
daos.description: An ecological asset origination system focused on reversing climate change and supporting regenerative initiatives by providing a platform for originating and investing in high-integrity carbon and biodiversity credits.

daos.name: Solarpunk DAO
daos.description: Leverages Web3 tools to build a decentralized infrastructure for a zero-emissions world, consistently funding endeavors in clean energy, regenerative agriculture, and ecosystem conservation.

daos.name: MangroveDAO
daos.description: Dedicated to restoring and protecting degraded mangroves through a token-based governance model, promoting biodiversity, combating climate change, and supporting coastal communities.

daos.name: Solar Foundation
daos.description: Funds and accelerates off-grid solar initiatives in underserved communities in emerging markets, leveraging blockchain to scale solar projects and achieve Sustainable Development Goal 7 (SDG7).

daos.name: MaEarth
daos.description: A community-led movement to align economic incentives with planetary health and regeneration, exploring the intersections of regenerative finance, technology, and the Earth.

daos.name: MesoReefDAO
daos.description: Aims to establish a coral reef restoration fund and a regenerative DeSci offset program, managed by the DAO community, to contribute to the conservation and restoration of the Mesoamerican Reef Ecosystem.

daos.name: Web3Beach
daos.description: Incentivizes environmental impact and web3 education, empowering communities to tackle environmental issues and foster regenerative practices through social and environmental activities like beach cleanups.

daos.name: Regró Project
daos.description: A regenerative initiative focused on climate, ecology, agriculture, and biodiversity, aiming to enhance land stewardship through various regenerative techniques.

daos.name: Treegens
daos.description: A nonprofit tree-planting project that gamifies environmental action, allowing users to earn tokens by planting mangrove trees and contributing to a global community for environmental conservation.

daos.name: Earthist DAO
daos.description: Combines traditional farming practices with modern technology to support industrial hemp farmers, promoting heirloom seed preservation and micro-processing to boost local economies and sustainable agriculture.

daos.name: Traditional Dream Factory (TDF)
daos.description: Transforms real estate into an opportunity for ecological restoration and community stewardship, using a co-living model where residents engage directly in environmental regeneration, with governance through its TDF token.

daos.name: .basin
daos.description: A protocol purpose-built to safeguard ecosystems and natural carbon sinks, aiming to redirect real-world asset (RWA) market capital towards climate, nature, and carbon projects in crypto.

daos.name: Climate Coordination Network (CCN)
daos.description: Combats climate change through collaborative efforts, uniting governments, NGOs, private sectors, and local communities, leveraging blockchain for transparent data management and decentralized decision-making.

daos.name: DoinGud
daos.description: A platform aiming to empower creators to tap into sources of income while supporting social impact causes, enabling creators to upload their work and receive payments.

daos.name: DRiP
daos.description: Enables the inexpensive creation and widespread distribution of digital art to users for free, fostering a community for new creators and art enthusiasts.

daos.name: KiftDAO
daos.description: A nonprofit DAO that creates a global network of community-owned living and working spaces, allowing individuals to purchase NFTs that grant them ownership and voting rights in the properties.

daos.name: Take Up Space
daos.description: A community, creator collective, and media company designed for culture-makers, envisioning a future where individuals can create and monetize their most authentic work.

daos.name: SpiritDAO
daos.description: A non-profit tokenized membership community aiming to build an action-oriented community of practitioners and partners working towards a relational universe, with a focus on understanding interconnectedness.

daos.name: Cult DAO
daos.description: For radicals and revolutionaries opposing centralization, aiming to empower and finance individuals who construct and contribute to a fully decentralized future.

daos.name: The DAOist
daos.description: Supports collaboration in all forms, emphasizing the cultural shift that DAOs enable, through IRL co-living spaces, events, and media.

daos.name: CabinDAO
daos.description: A network focused on building decentralized cities with shared governance, culture, and community, hosting IRL residences and retreats for digital nomads.

daos.name: WellnessDAO
daos.description: Aims to prioritize health and wellness practices throughout web3, offering meditation, yoga sessions, and group accountability tools.

daos.name: Ecodao
daos.description: A web3 gallery that supports the environment through regular NFT drops, with proceeds divided between the artist, ecological causes, and the DAO.

daos.name: Verses
daos.description: An evolving space to articulate visions for a flourishing future, collaborating on planting seeds towards an interdependent cyberspace and fostering a prefigurative politics.

daos.name: Meta Gamma Delta (MGD)
daos.description: Provides mentorship and community access, distributing UBI to women and funding women-led projects across various web3 domains.

daos.name: Surge Women
daos.description: Focused on educating and securing women's place in web3, providing access to opportunities like free educational subscriptions, mentorships, and financial tooling.

daos.name: HER DAO
daos.description: Aims to increase innovation and opportunities for economic success for women in Web3, sponsoring hacker houses for early-career and experienced women.

daos.name: she256
daos.description: A DAO offering gatherings and educational resources for women to participate in the web3 space, including mentorship programs, hackathons, and boot camps.

daos.name: Kernel
daos.description: An experiential, 8-week exploration of web3 that delves into the nature of work and its relation to human connection, fostering a regenerative web to enrich shared commons.

daos.name: Crypto Culture & Society (CCS)
daos.description: Builds the liberal arts of crypto, exploring the impact of crypto on culture and society through educational programs and real-time collaboration opportunities.

daos.name: Natives in Tech
daos.description: Cultivates an ecosystem of Native technologists, building free and open-source technology for Native communities, hosting conferences and creating opportunities for students to learn tech.

daos.name: SheFi
daos.description: An educational 8-week program known as the MBA of Web3 Learning, empowering women and non-binary individuals globally to master Web3 technologies and reinvent their careers.

daos.name: Remitt DAO
daos.description: An education DAO created for individuals excluded from traditional banking systems (e.g., migrants, asylum seekers) to educate them on using crypto as a digital remittance solution.

daos.name: Bankless DAO
daos.description: Aims to create a transparent, open, and accessible financial system, bypassing traditional banking structures through educational content, community-driven projects, and strategic partnerships.

daos.name: RegensUnite
daos.description: Has developed a platform to connect diverse sectors working on regenerative climate solutions, organizing inclusive, participatory events where diversity and equality are prioritized.

daos.name: The GreenPill Network
daos.description: A network society that exports regenerative digital infrastructure globally, with location-based chapters that localize impact through projects like reforestation efforts and QF funding rounds.

daos.name: Urbánika
daos.description: Aims to transform cities into SolarPunk communities, using a converted bus to offer educational workshops and facilitate neighborhood governance via open-source web3 technology.

daos.name: TalentDAO
daos.description: On a mission to enhance the effectiveness of decentralized organizational structures, conducting and publishing research in the Journal of Decentralized Work and developing tools for managing talent.

daos.name: Web3bridge
daos.description: Provides a free bridge to blockchain technology for Nigerian and African youths and students, driving blockchain adoption through quality builder training and support.

daos.name: DreamDAO
daos.description: Equips diverse Gen Z’ers worldwide with essential training, funding, mentorship, and opportunities in the web3 and social impact ecosystems.

daos.name: Celo
daos.description: A carbon-negative, mobile-first blockchain designed for financial inclusion, enabling access to decentralized financial (DeFi) tools and services.

daos.name: CoordinAPE
daos.description: A tool designed to facilitate value and resource allocation decisions within DAOs, aiming to build a cohesive community by recognizing and incentivizing contributors.

daos.name: Radicle & Drips
daos.description: Radicle is a web3 network for software collaboration (peer-to-peer stack), and Drips creates recurring funding streams for creators and redistributes value within the web3 ecosystem.

daos.name: Proof of Humanity (PoH)
daos.description: An Ethereum social identity verification system that creates a Sybil-proof list of humans, serving as bedrock infrastructure to implement Universal Basic Income (UBI).

daos.name: Protocol Labs
daos.description: An open-source research, development, and deployment laboratory that connects organizations across various technological fields, aiming to advance breakthroughs in computing to propel humanity forward.

daos.name: PrimeDAO
daos.description: Builds coordination tools for a collaborative web3 ecosystem, operating as network organizations that drive shared resource allocation for common goals.

daos.name: Orca Protocol
daos.description: Creates tools around DAO governance, focusing on "pods" as small, self-governed working groups centered around expertise, enabling composable metagovernance.

daos.name: Kleros
daos.description: A decentralized arbitration service and online dispute resolution protocol that uses smart contracts to make fair decisions, with jurors resolving disputes.

daos.name: Worldcoin
daos.description: Aims to onboard people globally into a collectively owned currency to achieve equal opportunity, proving "unique-humanness" through biometric verification.

daos.name: Metagov
daos.description: A research collective designing tools for navigating evolving applications of governance, aiming for an empowered, interconnected, and accountable governance layer for the internet.

daos.name: EAS (Ethereum Attestation Service)
daos.description: Public infrastructure enabling the creation and verification of onchain and offchain attestations, bringing clarity and trust to communities by unifying fragmented digital identity.

daos.name: RnDAO
daos.description: A digital swarm driving the future of work, a research-led venture studio and product ecosystem that partners with and builds modular collaboration-tech tools.

daos.name: LexDAO
daos.description: A club of legal engineering professionals dedicated to integrating legal frameworks into code, making coded agreements accessible, and building certified blockchain applications.

daos.name: Bloom Network
daos.description: A member-owned and governed cooperative connecting volunteers and entrepreneurs to grow projects benefiting local communities, combining elements of social media with local media feeds for deeper collaboration.

daos.name: dPANs (Decentralized Public Administration Networks)
daos.description: Local blockchain networks designed to incentivize the coordination of local citizens and organizations around specific collective functions, serving as a decentralized alternative to traditional public administration.

daos.name: Regen Hubs
daos.description: Community third spaces that utilize revenue from co-working memberships to provide physical hubs for localists, innovators, and change-makers, explicitly oriented to regenerating communities via decentralized networks.

daos.name: SaunaDAO
daos.description: A future project mentioned as a "collectively owned sauna, cold plunge, and hot tub infrastructure" managed by volunteers and coordination technology, implying a DAO structure for a civic utility.

daos.name: JournoDAO
daos.description: Focuses on rebuilding community news to protect democracy, providing information network resiliency through blockchain-emboldened local journalism.

daos.name: Optimism Collective
daos.description: A collaborative effort involving companies, communities, and individuals to reward public goods and build a sustainable future for Ethereum, implementing a retroactive public goods funding model.

daos.name: Tornado Cash
daos.description: A fully decentralized protocol for private transactions on Ethereum, enabling permissionless, shielded transactions without custodial risks using zero-knowledge cryptography.

daos.name: KarmaGap
daos.description: Known for its Grantee Accountability Protocol (GAP), which enhances transparency and accountability in managing community-issued grants by immutably recording data related to grant issuance and progress.

daos.name: Hypercerts
daos.description: An open-source blockchain protocol that improves funding and rewards positive impacts by enabling projects to mint fractionated Hypercerts as proof of contribution, enhancing public trust in funding public goods.

daos.name: Open Source Observer (OSO)
daos.description: An analytics suite designed to measure the impact of Open Source Software (OSS) contributions and grant mechanisms on ecosystem health, curating a massive database of projects and grant rounds.

daos.name: Thrive Protocol
daos.description: Focuses on enhancing value creation within web3 communities, prioritizing long-term values, and developing smart contracts to facilitate identifying, funding, and validating community contributions.

daos.name: Boost.xyz
daos.description: A platform that uses onchain tools to reward social and environmental impact, automating the distribution of rewards and incentives based on impact metrics or project milestones.

daos.name: Proof of Impact
daos.description: Dedicated to enhancing the credibility and transparency of social and environmental impact through advanced technology, providing verifiable and immutable records of impact metrics.

daos.name: Commons Stack
daos.description: Develops regenerative economics, sustainable management, and unique funding tools for impact communities, specializing in merging culture with token engineering.

daos.name: Curve Labs
daos.description: Designs modular organizational frameworks and digital cooperatives, exploring how to tokenize a new class of regenerative natural assets and apply them in real-life applications.

daos.name: Token Engineering Commons (TEC)
daos.description: Explores designing social communities and economic models, focusing on public good infrastructures and token engineering, supporting the development of a regenerative economy.

daos.name: RadicalxChange
daos.description: Explores the advancement of plurality, equality, community, and decentralization through building community and education about democratic innovation.

daos.name: Block Science
daos.description: Helps design human-centered complex systems and explores the parameters of Augmented Bonding Curves for Impact Financing.

daos.name: Other Internet
daos.description: Builds social technology that aligns with and embeds collective values and culture, exploring how to organize and collectively live our lives.

daos.name: Sovereign Nature
daos.description: Focuses on exploration and development to reconfigure the relationship with humans and nature, leveraging web3 and emerging technologies to design ecosystems.

daos.name: Values Index
daos.description: Building a crypto index fund that incorporates environmental, social, and governance (ESG) criteria, aiming to enable people to invest in projects aligned with their values.

daos.name: Crowdmuse
daos.description: An open-source collaboration platform for regenerative business models, building web3 primitives to enhance dynamic value creation/distribution and open-source R&D.

daos.name: Ethereal Forest DAO
daos.description: A research initiative that explores the potential of informal social protocols in urban settings and their isomorphism with web3 space.

daos.name: Kolektivo
daos.description: A networked system enabling Local Regenerative Economies by leveraging global toolkits and talent to implement in specific regions.

daos.name: GardensDAO
daos.description: A plug-and-play DAO governance framework for funding public goods, built around a Covenant and a Common Pool, ensuring community investment in projects.
